section.heading: Fees waived; no judicial approval necessary.

para.text: The Recorder shall waive any fees specifically directed at an owner's attempt to release an unlawful restriction from a deed or other document as described under § 42-1622 and § 42-1623.

No judicial approval is needed to release an unlawful restriction under § 42-1622 and § 42-1623. This section is not intended to alter the need for judicial approval otherwise required under law for any action except for the express release of an unlawful restriction.
